Html:
I have spent more time then I should be trying to figure this out.

I downloaded the razorengine and added both DLLS to my project.

In the controller everything looks correct and seems to work.  I am currently just using the exact code from the tutorial.

When I compile everything, I get this error:

{warning CS1685: The predefined type 'System.Func' is defined in multiple assemblies in the global alias; using definition from 'c:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework64\v4.0.30319\mscorlib.dll'}

 

I have been looking online, and all the normal fixes do not apply, Has anyone had this issue?
